title: Multi-objective Representation for Numbers in Clinical Narratives Using CamemBERT-bio
details: BA Lompo, TD Le - arXiv preprint arXiv:2405.18448, 2024
abstract: This research aims to classify numerical values extracted from medical documents across seven distinct physiological categories, employing CamemBERT-bio. Previous studies suggested that transformer-based models might not perform as well …
